title: Update Your Facebook iOS App To Save Your Phone's Battery
text:
Update Your Facebook iOS App To Save Your Phone's Battery 
Published By: Gizmodo.com - Today 
iOS users have been complaining about the Facebook app’s big battery drain. Today Facebook admitted it had a problem–and pushed an updat...
